A trous wavelet transform object class using cubic spline wavelet for panchromatic sharpening of multispectral images: Aiazzi, B., Alparone, L., Baronti, S., and Garzelli, A.

Routine details

top ATWT::Init

result = ATWT::Init(image)

A trous wavelet transform object class using cubic spline wavelet for panchromatic sharpening of multispectral images:

Aiazzi, B., Alparone, L., Baronti, S., and Garzelli, A. (2002). Context-driven fusion of high spatial and spectral resolution images based on oversampled ;multiresolution analysis. IEEE Transactions on Geoscience and Remote ;Sensing, 40(10), 2300–2312.

Parameters

image in required

grayscale image to be transformed

Examples

dwt = Obj_New("ATWT",image)

Author information

Author:

Mort Canty (2009)
